item.title: Hundreds Gather at National Parks Across U.S. to Protest Job Cuts
item.description: From Acadia in Maine to Joshua Tree in Southern California, protesters turned out to stand up against what they see as threats to public lands.

item.title: Trump Signs Order to Designate English as Official Language of the U.S.
item.description: The order did not require changes to federal programs but was a victory for America’s English-only movement, which has ties to efforts to restrict imm...

item.title: Wildfires in the Carolinas Prompt Evacuations
item.description: Gusty winds combined with dry air and unusually high temperatures were fueling the rapid spread of fires on Saturday.

item.title: Angie Stone, Hip-Hop Pioneer Turned Neo-Soul Singer, Dies at 63
item.description: After having success as a member of the Sequence, an early female rap group, she re-emerged in the 1990s as a practitioner of sultry, laid-back R&B.

item.title: Mystery of Gene Hackman’s Death Brings Grief and Bewilderment to Santa Fe
item.description: Residents mourning Mr. Hackman and his wife, Betsy Arakawa, are consumed by the unusual circumstances surrounding their deaths and why they were not d...
